oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CHANGING OF LOCAL WAVE CLIMATE DUE TO EBB DELTA MIGRATION
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kaiser, Ralf
Niemeyer, Hanz D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ebb delta
delta migration
wave climate
local climate
climate change
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Field measurements highlighted enormous changes in the attenuation of waves propagating from offshore across the ebb delta on the shoreface of the East Frisian island of Norderney. The application of mathematical wave model SWAN made evident that the migration of the ebb delta is the cause of these changes. The results are very important for coastal protection measures.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 26 (1998): Proceedings of 26th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Copenhagen, Denmark, 1998.
